name: prince
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
B1 an important male member of a royal family, especially a son or grandson of the king or queen: Prince Edward Prince Juan Carlos of Spain became king in 1975.
a male ruler of a country, usually a small country: Prince Albert II is the ruling prince of Monaco. prince among/of something literary
a man who is excellent at something: that prince of flautists, William Bennett
See more
More examplesFewer examplesThe witch cast a spell on the prince and he turned into a frog.The prince has two bodyguards watching over him every hour of the day.

a member of a royal family, esp. a son of a king or queen
A prince is also a male ruler of a small country.
